word:
5
     WHILE ELLEN WHITE NEVER VISITED SOUTH AFRICA IN PERSON SHE CONDUCTED REGULAR CORRESPONDENCE WITH LEADERS AND MEMBERS THERE WHILE SHE WAS IN AUSTRALIA FROM 1891 TO 1900. THERE ARE IN THE FILES MANY LETTERS FROM THE PEN OF ELLEN WHITE TO MEMBERS OF THE WESSELS FAMILY STARTING IN 1890 AND SPANNING THE YEARS TO 1908, ONLY SEVEN YEARS BEFORE HER DEATH.
